data.persona: I am a member of the royal family. I am the king's nephew. I hope to see the throne one day.
data.description:
You are in the Castle Kitchen.
The kitchen a large room with stone walls and floors. There are cast iron and copper pots on stone shelves. There is a large fire burning stove located in the middle of the room.
There's a stove, a vegetable., a shelf, a meat, a pot, a meal, and a wood here.
The servant and the mouse are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am showing warm feelings towards the servant since he is my friend
data.mid_motivation: I should express my fondness for those I care about, so that I will always feel safe when I am with them
data.long_motivation: I want the servant to always remember that someone cares about him
